scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rimraf .cache && rimraf lib && rimraf es && rimraf dist && rimraf dist-min
scripts.build:commonJS: rimraf lib && tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir lib
scripts.build:es-module: rimraf es-module && tsc --module esnext --target es5 --outDir es
scripts.build:es-bundle: rimraf es-bundle && rimraf .cache && parcel build es/index.js --no-minify --experimental-scope-hoisting --out-dir es-bundle
scripts.start-node-example: yarn run build:commonJS && yarn run open-node-example
